Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Identifiable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
  • public class Player
extends Identifiable
    This class represent a Player of the game.

      • getDamageOrder

        public java.util.List<PlayerToken> getDamageOrder()
        The damage order of this player's board. It is used to calculate points assignment.
        Returns:
        A list containing the Tokens of the players that dealt damage to this player, ordered by the amount of damage dealt and secondly by the recentness the damage.

      • canPay

        public boolean canPay​(java.util.List<AmmoColor> cost)
        States whether a player can pay a certain cost. First checks if you can pay using solely the ammos, then if you can't, checks also the powerups.
        Parameters:
        cost - List of AmmoColors that represents the cost of the thing you have to pay for
        Returns:
        True if you can pay, false if you are too poor to pay
